Reviews.Title: Battered and bruised
Reviews.Author: Rohit Mordani "Rohit"
Reviews.Content: The phone was not in the condition as described in the product description.  It had a LOT of scratches in the back cover.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: J. Jackson
Reviews.Content: The product sold is awful. It was not anywhere close to the description online. I had high expectations but when the package arrived I was unsatisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Better then expected
Reviews.Author: dave vannelli
Reviews.Content: It was worth it I actually thought it would be in worse condition but for the price it's really good

Reviews.Title: If you like vintage stuff.....
Reviews.Author: Brian K
Reviews.Content: Just take it with reasonable amount of money. If you are an Apple collector like me, it is the best choice that you can ever get.

Reviews.Title: Marvelous Original iPhone 2007 Model A1203
Reviews.Author: DavidRN
Reviews.Content: The design of this iPhone is of top quality and it feels sturdy in your hands unlike the new plastic/glass models.In the U.S.A this iPhone was only available through AT&T; with a 2-Year Contract at a whopping $499 price tag.It is uncommonly hard to find this iPhone with original box and contents, specially in mint condition!This is a magnificent addition to anyone's collection or apple fans.

Reviews.Title: This is just a collector phone and not antique phone.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The original 1st generation iPhone 1 is just like other normal cellphones, no frequent updates, several app can't download because due to compatibility on the ios update number. Other than receiving calls, updates, mails, jailbreak it fast, use the internet, and playing music.  It is just a collector phone nowadays.

Reviews.Title: plan
Reviews.Author: wmilbach
Reviews.Content: Does it have to come with a plan Cu's I would just use it for apps. Like an ipod touch

Reviews.Content: dose this come with the box because i think the box is cool and i really want it  because i bought it so dose it come with the box
